numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Younger people are more optimistic than older people.
2. In many countries, older people say that things are getting worse.
3. I wonder if each country has an impact on the percentages.
4. I wonder if the population age in a country affects the percentages.
5. I wonder if how well a country is doing affects the percentages.
6. This issue relates to my community.
7. I am pessimistic about this issue.
8. I am pessimistic about most things.
12. Pessimistic percentages: Why are young people so optimistic?
